definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Generally several extended families live in such a compound.
sentences.chinese: 通常全家人生活在一个大院里。

sentences.english: Aside from my room, there are two dozens of rooms in this courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 除了我这房间，大院里还有二十多间房呢。
他们往教堂大院那边去了。

sentences.english: Toward the back of the room there was a large patio, featuring a good view of the city at night.
sentences.chinese: 在房间的后面，有一个大院，可以观看城市的夜景。

sentences.english: He made the courtyard of the priests, and the large court and the doors for the court, and overlaid the doors with bronze.
sentences.chinese: 又建立祭司院和大院，并院门，用铜包裹门扇。

sentences.english: Beautiful gold murals are located under each eave of the compound.
sentences.chinese: 整个大院所有房间的屋檐下部都有漂亮的真金彩绘。

sentences.english: Inside Beijing the city strolls today, still can see constantly deep curtilage courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 今天在北京内城漫步，还能时时看见深宅大院。

sentences.english: In addition to my room, there were some twenty rooms in the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 除了我这房间，大院里还有二十多间房呢。

sentences.english: I used to go and see him in the office of the Court of Wards in Maniktala.
sentences.chinese: 我常到位于玛尼克塔拉街的沃兹大院的办公室去看他。

sentences.english: At last we reached the Committee's compound.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于抵达了“委员会”的大院。

sentences.english: My friend's family lives in the compound .
sentences.chinese: 我朋友的家住在那个大院里。

sentences.english: Normally, the gate of a large mansion house faces the south.
sentences.chinese: 一般的深宅大院大门的确是朝南开的。

sentences.english: Luo Grand Courtyard, a local family, is at this time of grief.
sentences.chinese: 罗家大院，当地一个大家族，此时正处于悲伤中。

sentences.english: Wang Jia Dayuan. Return to Taiyuan. Take night train to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 参观王家大院，返回太原，乘夜火车回北京。

sentences.english: Churchyards often have sundials in them.
sentences.chinese: 教堂大院里通常设置日晷。

sentences.english: He received numerous visitors and walked freely around the hospital and outside the compound.
sentences.chinese: 他大量接受来访者并到医院周围和大院外面自由散步。

definition: courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
compound with many families living together
